channel.title: CVE Feed for Veeam -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Veeam -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-40713|2024-09-09T14:22:01.961Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20recovery
item.description: A vulnerability that allows a user who has been assigned a low-privileged role within Veeam Backup & Replication to alter Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) settings and bypass MFA.

item.title: CVE-2024-42024|2024-09-09T14:11:39.524Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: A vulnerability that allows an attacker in possession of the Veeam ONE Agent service account credentials to perform remote code execution on the machine where the Veeam ONE Agent is installed.

item.title: CVE-2024-40714|2024-09-09T14:03:17.836Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20recovery
item.description: An improper certificate validation vulnerability in TLS certificate validation allows an attacker on the same network to intercept sensitive credentials during restore operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-42022|2024-09-09T14:15:21.746Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: An incorrect permission assignment vulnerability allows an attacker to modify product configuration files.

item.title: CVE-2024-40718|2024-09-07T16:11:22.238Z -- veeam -- nutanix%20ahv
item.description: A server side request forgery vulnerability allows a low-privileged user to perform local privilege escalation through exploiting an SSRF vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-42023|2024-09-07T16:11:22.238Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability allows low-privileged users to execute code with Administrator privileges remotely.

item.title: CVE-2024-40713|2024-09-07T16:11:22.216Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20recovery
item.description: A vulnerability that allows a user who has been assigned a low-privileged role within Veeam Backup & Replication to alter Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) settings and bypass MFA.

item.title: CVE-2024-40711|2024-09-07T16:11:22.213Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20%20recovery
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability with a malicious payload can allow an unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE).

item.title: CVE-2024-40709|2024-09-07T16:11:22.216Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20recovery
item.description: A missing authorization vulnerability allows a local low-privileged user on the machine to escalate their privileges to root level.

item.title: CVE-2024-38650|2024-09-07T16:11:22.353Z -- veeam -- veeam%20service%20provider%20console
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability can allow a low privileged attacker to access the NTLM hash of service account on the VSPC server.

item.title: CVE-2024-42021|2024-09-07T16:11:22.333Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability allows an attacker with valid access tokens to access saved credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-39715|2024-09-07T16:11:22.204Z -- veeam -- veeam%20service%20provider%20console
item.description: A code injection vulnerability that allows a low-privileged user with REST API access granted to remotely upload arbitrary files to the VSPC server using REST API, leading to remote code execution on VSPC server.

item.title: CVE-2024-42019|2024-09-07T16:11:22.117Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: A vulnerability that allows an attacker to access the NTLM hash of the Veeam Reporter Service service account. This attack requires user interaction and data collected from Veeam Backup & Replication.

item.title: CVE-2024-42024|2024-09-07T16:11:22.220Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: A vulnerability that allows an attacker in possession of the Veeam ONE Agent service account credentials to perform remote code execution on the machine where the Veeam ONE Agent is installed.

item.title: CVE-2024-40710|2024-09-07T16:11:22.182Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20recovery
item.description: A series of related high-severity vulnerabilities, the most notable enabling remote code execution (RCE) as the service account and extraction of sensitive information (savedcredentials and passwords). Exploiting these vulnerabilities requires a user who has been assigned a low-privileged role within Veeam Backup & Replication.

item.title: CVE-2024-39718|2024-09-07T16:11:22.180Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20recovery
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability that allows a low-privileged user to remotely remove files on the system with permissions equivalent to those of the service account.

item.title: CVE-2024-40714|2024-09-07T16:11:22.237Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20recovery
item.description: An improper certificate validation vulnerability in TLS certificate validation allows an attacker on the same network to intercept sensitive credentials during restore operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-39714|2024-09-07T16:11:22.188Z -- veeam -- veeam%20service%20provider%20console
item.description: A code injection vulnerability that permits a low-privileged user to upload arbitrary files to the server, leading to remote code execution on VSPC server.

item.title: CVE-2024-38651|2024-09-07T16:11:22.198Z -- veeam -- veeam%20service%20provider%20console
item.description: A code injection vulnerability can allow a low-privileged user to overwrite files on that VSPC server, which can lead to remote code execution on VSPC server.

item.title: CVE-2024-40712|2024-09-07T16:11:22.203Z -- veeam -- backup%20and%20recovery
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability allows an attacker with a low-privileged account and local access to the system to perform local privilege escalation (LPE).

item.title: CVE-2024-42022|2024-09-07T16:11:22.220Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: An incorrect permission assignment vulnerability allows an attacker to modify product configuration files.

item.title: CVE-2024-42020|2024-09-07T16:11:22.194Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: A Cross-site-scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the Reporter Widgets that allows HTML injection.

item.title: CVE-2024-29850|2024-08-02T01:17:58.294Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows account takeover via NTLM relay.

item.title: CVE-2024-29852|2024-08-02T01:17:58.340Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows high-privileged users to read backup session logs.

item.title: CVE-2024-29853|2024-08-02T01:17:58.146Z -- veeam -- agent%20for%20windows
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows allows for local privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2024-29851|2024-08-02T01:17:58.142Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows high-privileged users to steal NTLM hash of Enterprise manager service account.

item.title: CVE-2024-29849|2024-08-02T01:17:58.438Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-29212|2024-08-02T01:10:54.643Z -- veeam -- service%20provider%20console
item.description: Due to an unsafe de-serialization method used by the Veeam Service Provider Console(VSPC) server in communication between the management agent and its components, under certain conditions, it is possible to perform Remote Code Execution (RCE) on the VSPC server machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-29855|2024-08-02T01:17:58.173Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Hard-coded JWT secret allows authentication bypass in Veeam Recovery Orchestrator

item.title: CVE-2024-29850|2024-07-12T20:28:19.501Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows account takeover via NTLM relay.

item.title: CVE-2024-29849|2024-07-09T21:27:17.792Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.

item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.

item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows account takeover via NTLM relay.

item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows high-privileged users to steal NTLM hash of Enterprise manager service account.

item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows allows for local privilege escalation.

item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.

item.description: Hard-coded JWT secret allows authentication bypass in Veeam Recovery Orchestrator

item.description: Due to an unsafe de-serialization method used by the Veeam Service Provider Console(VSPC) server in communication between the management agent and its components, under certain conditions, it is possible to perform Remote Code Execution (RCE) on the VSPC server machine.
